function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of coyotes in downtown-adjacent neighborhood","Impact":"Risk of animal-borne diseases and human-wildlife conflict","Mitigation":"Implement measures to manage wildlife presence and educate residents on coexistence","Technologies":"Wildlife tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Residents, pedestrians, and local wildlife","Owner":"Local government and wildlife management authorities"},{"Description":"Change in urban soundscape due to COVID-19","Impact":"Loss of familiar sounds and introduction of new, unfamiliar sounds","Mitigation":"Promote mental well-being through sound management and city planning","Technologies":"Sound mapping and urban planning tools","People":"City residents, urban planners, and public health authorities","Owner":"Local government and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Transformation of urban soundscape as a reduction in the sounds of capitalism","Impact":"Socio-economic shifts and changes in urban environment","Mitigation":"Develop inclusive urban policies and economic support systems","Technologies":"Urban sound analysis tools, socio-economic impact assessment tools","People":"Local businesses, residents, and urban development stakeholders","Owner":"Local government and urban development authorities"}]}
